import React, { useState } from "react"; import Scrollspy from "react-scrollspy"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import ReactTooltip from "react-tooltip"; import { FiUser, FiBriefcase, FiFileText, FiPhoneOutgoing, FiMail, } from "react-icons/fi"; import { FaHome, FaBlog, FaParagraph, FaToiletPaper, FaRecordVinyl } from "react-icons/fa"; const Header = () => { const [click, setClick] = useState(false); const handleClick = () => setClick(!click); return ( <> {/* Header */}
{/* End Header */} {/* nav bar */}
